title: How Businesses Turn 'Rogue Waves' to Their Advantage
itunes:title: How Businesses Turn 'Rogue Waves' to Their Advantage
description:
Jonathan Brill, former Hewlett Packard Senior Global Futurist, discusses his book “Rogue Waves: Future-Proof Your Business to Survive and Profit from Radical Change.”

Host: Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
